headline: Arista Networks Records US$1b Net Income As AI Demand Shapes Outlook
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) reported robust fourth quarter results with record revenue and net income. The company crossed US$1b in quarterly net income and shipped 150 million ports. Management highlighted sustained demand for AI networking and progress in campus expansion. Arista issued optimistic forward guidance that points to continued growth and competitive strength. Arista sits at the center of high speed cloud and AI networking, supplying switches and software to hyperscale data...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Arista Networks (ANET) After A 23% One-Year Gain?
summary: If you are wondering whether Arista Networks is fairly priced or offering value at today's levels, it helps to step back and look at what the current share price actually reflects. The stock recently closed at US$135.12, with returns of 5.0% over the last 7 days, 4.0% over 30 days, 1.1% year to date and 23.1% over the past year. This naturally raises questions about how much future upside or risk is already in the price. Alongside this share price performance, investors have been weighing...
